name: butterfat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the natural fat found in milk that is used to make butter: Sheep milk is about 18% butterfat. Butterfats for these cows are generally about 4 percent, and milk yields can be almost as high as a Jersey cow's. Brie has a high butterfat content.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cows gave a good yield of milk rich in butterfat.The amount of fat in milk is measured in percent of butterfat.Ghee is the pure butterfat left over after the milk solids and water are removed from butter.
